title: Minute Man National Historical Park: Self Guided
body: Self Guided         When on a self-guided visit to the park, we recommend you start by viewing our multimedia show, "The Road to Revolution." This 25 minute program provides an excellent introduction to the story of April 19, 1775.  The show runs every 30 minutes from 9:00 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. Self-guided groups are seated as general public as space allows.  If you are visiting between late June and October you are most welcome to attend one of our daily ranger programs, offered free to the public. No reservations are required.
